com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.gui

Class MQSCDoubleClickSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.gui.MQSCDoubleClickSelector

  • public class MQSCDoubleClickSelector
extends java.lang.Object

    This implements an ITextDoubleClickStrategy to select and match brackets or words or etc. It currently works for "{" and "}", but that's probably default behavior and should be removed.

        protected int searchForClosingBracket(int startPosition,
                                      char openBracket,
                                      char closeBracket,
                                      IDocument document)
                               throws BadLocationException
        Returns the position of the closing bracket after startPosition.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - - the beginning position
        openBracket - - the character that represents the open bracket
        closeBracket - - the character that represents the close bracket
        document - - the document being searched
        Throws:
        BadLocationException

      • searchForOpenBracket

        Parameters:
        startPosition - - the beginning position
        openBracket - - the character that represents the open bracket
        closeBracket - - the character that represents the close bracket
        document - - the document being searched

        BadLocationException

      • selectBracketBlock

        protected boolean selectBracketBlock()
        Select the area between the selected bracket and the closing bracket. Return true if successful.
